quiz.quizQuestion: What is a correct variable name in JavaScript?

What JavaScript build-in method shift() is doing?
options: It adds an empty element to array end

It removes the first element in the array
It adds an empty element to the beginning of the array
quiz.correctAnswer: It removes the first element in the array
